keyword: calories in a skinny vanilla latte at starbucks
title: Calories in a Skinny Vanilla Latte at Starbucks
meta_description: Learn calories in a skinny vanilla latte at Starbucks (grande size), including full nutrition facts like carbs, protein, fat, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in a Skinny Vanilla Latte at Starbucks
assumptions: Grande (16 oz) size; nonfat milk, sugar-free vanilla syrup, espresso; no whipped cream or extra sweeteners.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, customizations, milk type, syrup brand, and location. Check Starbucks app or labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A grande Starbucks Skinny Vanilla Latte has 130 calories and 12 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Tall size (12 oz) instead of grande

faqs.q: How many calories in a grande skinny vanilla latte at Starbucks?
faqs.a: About 130 calories for a grande size.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a Starbucks skinny vanilla latte?
faqs.a: Approximately 12 g protein from the nonfat milk and espresso.

faqs.q: Does a skinny vanilla latte have fat?
faqs.a: No fat (0 g) when made with nonfat milk; carbs come from milk and syrup.

faqs.q: How do calories change with size for Starbucks skinny lattes?
faqs.a: Tall: ~100 kcal, Grande: 130 kcal, Venti: ~190 kcal.

faqs.q: Is the skinny vanilla syrup sugar-free at Starbucks?
faqs.a: Yes, it uses sugar-free vanilla syrup, reducing sugars compared to regular.
